plot: Liu Ying is a Taiwanese girl who meets Singaporean Zhu Ziqing in Sydney on overseas studies. The both of them fall in love but are not able to keep up the romance till a few years later, ...
plot_en: Liu Ying is a Taiwanese girl who meets Singaporean Zhu Ziqing in Sydney on overseas studies. The both of them fall in love but are not able to keep up the romance till a few years later, ...

title: Zai jian ying guang lan
